sentences.en: A highly flexible network structure is built as a new neural network.
sentences.cn: 作为一种新型的神经网络,创建了具有高度柔性特性的网络结构.

sentences.en: Aim To study some applications of a neural networks in combinatorial optimization.
sentences.cn: 目的研究神经网络在组合最优化问题中的应用.

sentences.en: An application of cellular neural network ( CNN ) in mathematical morphology is presented.
sentences.cn: 给出了细胞神经网络 ( CNN ) 在数学形态学中的应用.

sentences.en: An efficient intrusion detection technology on probabilistic neural networks is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于概率神经网络的高效入侵检测技术.

sentences.en: Folic acid helps prevent neural tube birth defects such as spina bifida.
sentences.cn: 叶酸能帮助防止诸如脊柱裂等神经管畸形出生缺陷的发生.

sentences.en: Here the author emphasizes non - linear neural networks used to data mining.
sentences.cn: 作者在文中重点论述了用于数据开采的非线性神经网络.

sentences.en: In 100,000 births, a screening program would avent 187 neural tube defects.
sentences.cn: 在100,000婴儿中, 一项筛检可避免187个神经管缺陷.

sentences.en: Its principal constituents are fuzzy logic, neural network and evolutional computing.
sentences.cn: 它主要由模糊逻辑 、 神经网络、进化计算等组成.

sentences.en: Neural networks are computer systems which mimic the workings of the brain.
sentences.cn: 神经网络是模拟大脑工作方式的计算机系统。

sentences.en: Not to mention the physical effects of neural or endocrine overload.
sentences.cn: 更不用说神经和内分沁超负荷对身体的影响了.

sentences.en: Optimum Method About Weights and Thresholds of Neural Network.
sentences.cn: 神经网络权值和阈值的优化方法.

sentences.en: The information transmission in neural system depends on neurotransmitters.
sentences.cn: 信息传递的神经途径有赖于神经递质.

sentences.en: The neural network can preferably solve the non - linear problem.
sentences.cn: 利用神经网络建模可以较好地解决非线性问题.

sentences.en: The neural tube then might induce the formation of still other embryonic structures.
sentences.cn: 神经管可能诱导其他胚胎结构的形成.

sentences.en: We download your personality into my neural net until we get this sorted out.
sentences.cn: 我们下载你的性格特征到我的大脑中枢去直到查出为止.

words.tran_cn: [解剖] 神经鞘；[解剖] 神经膜
[解剖]神经的；神经系统的；背的；神经中枢的

trans.tran_en: relating to a nerve or the nervous system
